data.name: Octogeddon - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The complete original soundtrack to Octogeddon!

Music provided in MP3 and lossless FLAC format with full tagging. An "Octogeddon Soundtrack" folder will be downloaded with both mp3 and flac folders containing all files.

1. Octogeddon! (Title Screen) [2:40]
2. The Road to Rage (Level Select) [1:07]
3. Angry Octopus instrumental (New York Ocean) [2:42]
4. New York Squishy (NY City) [3:19]
5. Didgeridoo I'm Coming for You (Sydney Ocean) [3:19]
6. Sunsets and No Regrets (Sydney City) [3:36]
7. Octovania (Tokyo Ocean) [2:48]
8. Nightlife-or-Death (Tokyo City) [3:05]
9. French Dip (France Ocean) [3:07]
10. Eiffel Scuffle (Paris City) [3:02]
11. Sea to Blimey Sea (DC Ocean) [2:00]
12. OCTOpus vs PENTAgon (DC City) [3:12]
13. Badliest Catch (Miniboss) [2:59]
14. Rocktogeddon (Boss Fight) [3:36]
15. Sushi Showdown (Final Boss) [3:14]
16. Fish Are Friends (Minigame) [1:58]
17. Mad Doctor Octopus (Laboratory) [2:24]
18. BASSa Nova (Shell Shop) [2:02]
19. OctoDead 'un (Game Over) [1:16]
20. Angry Octopus (Credits) [2:18]
21. Octogoodies (Power Up) [0:06]
22. George Fanfare (Victory) [1:36]
23. One Tentacle (Release Trailer) [0:38]
24. Angry Octopus (Unplugged) [2:18]

Total runtime - 58:22

data.short_description: The complete original soundtrack to Octogeddon! Music provided in MP3 and lossless FLAC format with full tagging. An "Octogeddon Soundtrack" folder will be downloaded with both mp3 and flac folders containing all files.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Graphics: n\a
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any capable of playing MP3
  • Additional Notes: This is not an application, just a collection of MP3s and FLAC files!
